doc.title: Million Stars Goreng Pisang: Do you eat Tempura but Shun Goreng Pisang?
doc.text: I/PRP had/VBD some/JJ pretty/RB amazing/JJ Tempura/NN during/IN my/PRP$ trip/NN to/TO Tokyo/VB and/CC that/WDT got/VBD me/PRP trying/VBG to/TO make/VB some/JJ Tempura/NN at/IN home/NN ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ quite/RB an/DT art/NN to/TO get/VB the/DT batter/NN to/TO that/WDT crisp/JJ consistency/NN ./. But/CC so/RB far/JJ my/PRP$ batter/NN has/VBZ n't/RB turn/VB out/IN quite/RB the/DT way/NN I/PRP want/VB it/PRP ./. Anyway/RB ,/, we/PRP are/VBP not/RB talking/VBG Tempura/NN ,/, but/CC Goreng/JJ Pisang/NN today/NN ./. I/PRP managed/VBD to/TO get/VB to/TO speak/VB to/TO 70/VB year/NN old/JJ Mr/NNP Chan/NNP who/WP has/VBZ just/RB resumed/VBD working/VBG again/RB after/IN the/DT renovation/NN of/IN Changi/NNP Village/NNP Food/NNP Centre/NN and/CC learned/VBD a/DT few/JJ secrets/NN about/IN the/DT humble/JJ goreng/NN pisang/NN which/WRB I/PRP had/VBD never/RB known/VBN before/IN ./. The/DT most/NN important/JJ thing/NN about/IN goreng/NNP pisang/NNP -LRB-/NNP fried/VBD banana/NN -RRB-/NN is/VBZ ,/, well/RB ,/, the/DT pisang/NNP -LRB-/NNP banana/NNP -RRB-/. itself/PRP ./. You/PRP can/VB of/IN course/NN buy/VB other/JJ deep/JJ fried/VBD stuff/NN like/IN sweet/JJ potatoes/NNS ,/, yam/NN and/CC jackfruit/NN but/CC this/DT hawker/NN dish/NN is/VBZ called/VBD goreng/NN PISANG/NN ,/, so/RB ,/, naturally/NN ,/, you/PRP should/MD be/VB able/JJ to/TO gauge/VB the/DT quality/NN of/IN the/DT stall/NN by/IN the/DT quality/NN of/IN the/DT pisang/NN ./. Mr/NNP Chan/NNP was/VBD kind/JJ enough/JJ to/TO share/VB with/IN me/PRP his/PRP$ recipe/NN for/IN the/DT batter/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ essentially/RB made/VBD up/NN of/IN two/CD types/NNS of/IN rice/NN flour/NN ./. One/PRP is/VBZ dry/JJ milled/NN while/IN the/DT other/JJ one/CD is/VBZ wet/JJ milled/NN ./. The/DT dry/JJ milled/NN rice/NN flour/NN is/VBZ great/JJ for/IN producing/VBG the/DT crispy/JJ texture/NN while/IN the/DT wet/JJ milled/NN variety/NN gives/VBZ it/PRP a/DT bit/NN of/IN a/DT chewy/JJ bite/VB ./. That/DT ,/, I/PRP guess/VBP ,/, is/VBZ to/TO encourage/VB the/DT disciple/NN to/TO keep/VB persisting/NN on/IN his/PRP$ own/JJ until/IN he/PRP finally/RB achieves/VBD his/PRP$ own/JJ enlightenment/NN ./. But/CC I/PRP digress/VBP .../: Aside/RB from/IN the/DT usual/JJ yam/NN ,/, sweet/JJ potatoes/NNS and/CC green/JJ bean/NN fritters/NN ,/, this/DT uncle/NN has/VBZ also/RB come/VB up/IN with/IN a/DT few/JJ more/JJ interesting/JJ flavors/NNS which/WDT is/VBZ worth/JJ a/DT try/VB ./. The/DT yam/NN and/CC pumpkin/NN fritter/NN is/VBZ like/IN a/DT deep/JJ fried/VBD Teochew/NNP Orh/NNP Nee/NNP -LRB-/NNP mashed/NNP yam/NNP with/IN stewed/VBN pumpkin/JJ -RRB-/NN and/CC she/PRP also/RB does/VBZ another/DT one/CD where/WRB she/PRP stacks/VBD a/DT slice/NN of/IN Nian/NNP Gao/NNP -LRB-/NNP sticky/NNP New/NNP Year/NN glutinous/JJ rice/NN cakes/NNS -RRB-/RB ,/, yam/NN and/CC sweet/JJ potato/NN together/RB ./. I/PRP wonder/VB if/IN I/PRP could/MD get/VB him/PRP to/TO do/VB the/DT Scottish/NNP classic/NNP fried/VBD Mars/NNP Bar/NNP ?/. Would/MD you/PRP be/VB keen/VBD to/TO try/VB it/PRP ?/.
